has attuned �[himself/herself] to the runic portal, and opened a path from the Ilrusi Atoll staging point to the Chamber of Passage.�
You can feel a strong magical power emanating from the center of the gate. It seems powerful enough to transport you to a distant place.1�
Give in to the magical power?It's worth a shot.You must be joking!1�
Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, �[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.1�
Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?1�
I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.1�
Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.Let's hear one(2).1�

What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.Get the Picture.Immortal Sentries.Luck of the Draw.The Die Is Cast(pt.1).The Die Is Cast(pt.2).No Strings Attached.Equipped for All Occasions(pt.1).Equipped for All Occasions(pt.2).Beginnings.The Black Coffin(pt.1).The Black Coffin(pt.2).The Black Coffin(pt.3).Ghosts of the Past.Navigating the Unfriendly Seas(pt.1).Navigating the Unfriendly Seas(pt.2).Against All Odds(pt.1).Against All Odds(pt.2).Against All Odds(pt.3).Breaking the Bonds of Fate(pt.1).Breaking the Bonds of Fate(pt.2).Prevalence of Pirates.Shades of Vengeance.Legacy of the Lost(pt.1).Legacy of the Lost(pt.2).1�
Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.1�
Yes? What do you require?1�
You wish to tell me something, yes? What is it?1�
Show her the 3����?Yes.I have nothing to say.1�
Then please withdraw immediately.1�
You show the 3���� to the Immortal.1�
A light gleams in Meyaada's eyes!�
This scent is heavenly...1�
Thank you.1�
I can give you some valuable information.1�
Behind you lies a gleaming blue device.1�
It is called a ��runic portal.��1�
Runic portals were developed by the Aht Urhgan alchemists utilizing state-of-the-art technology.1�
I am sure that you will find them most useful.1�
You can use a runic portal to transport yourself to Al Zahbi in a moment's time.1�
After going to Al Zahbi once using the portal, you can freely travel back and forth between the Imperial capital and here.1�
I am sure you will find many an occasion to use it.1�
Mwahahahaha...1�
Mwahaha...I am Fhu Madihmin...1�
Mwahahahaha...1�
I don't get many visitors here on the edge of the reef...1�
Bwahahahaha...1�
What could you be looking for?1�
Mwahaha...1�
You don't have to answer me.1�
I know what you seek...1�
Mwahahahaha...1�
Bwahahahaha...1�
That 3���� you clutch in your flesh-and-blood hand...1�
...mwahaha...1�
...will be your fare to board the Coffin...1�

Mwahahahaha...1�

Farewell...1�
They finally show their forms...1�
I had concealed my presence, but sensed a chill in the air.1�
Then I noticed you on the deck, with some rather unfriendly company.1�
I must admit to my surprise.1�
But it is good to see another Sentinel who shares my instincts.1�
The being that gave the orders...1�
His supernatural aura was palpable.1�
We can assume he is the captain of the ship.1�
If we can but uncover the true identity of that apparition, the secrets of the ghost ship will be ours.1�
Fortunately, I have another 3���� for me, and one for you.1�
When you are prepared, let us return to the Ashu Talif, blades bared!1�
Yes? What do you require?1�

With this in your possession, you will be able to pass through the runic seal and enter the Assault area.Good luck.1�
You refuse to assume leadership?Perhaps you should make that decision before you speak to me.1�
No?Then I suggest you complete your preparations and await your leader's orders!1�

Naturally, you are also charged with the responsibility of making sure your party members are ready to enter the Assault area.1�
However, successfully completing an Assault mission under your command will most certainly improve your standing with the Empire.1�
